DRUG.name: The French document lists “Catioresine Sulfo Calcique”

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the resin administered by oral and rectal route: risk of colonic necrosis, possibly fatal

DRUG.name: The French document lists “Catioresine Sulfo Sodique”

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the resin administered by oral and rectal route: risk of colonic necrosis, possibly fatal.
